name: editkernelcmdline
text:
Edit the Kernel Command Line
Keyword: %1
Value: %2
Allow multiple values: %3
longDescription: Ensures that the given keyword appears on the kernel command line (/boot/cmdline.txt).  If a value is given, then the keyword will be added as a 'keyword=value' pair, replacing the keyword and it's value if it is already present.  If only a keyword is given, it will be added to the command line.
